channel.title: I cannot see the rep ++ button somebody help?
channel.description: I can't seem to see the rep++ button i have 26 rep but i can't seem to find the button to rep others if any 1 can help me i would be very appreciative and there might be a reward in for them :P if u get my drift thanks much!

item.title: I cannot see the rep ++ button somebody help?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:8, topic:247307”][quote author=thefalloffuckingtroy. link=topic=326292.msg2557476#msg2557476 date=1227993269]

I’m pretty sure you need 25 posts.

An Error Has Occurred!
Sorry, you don’t have enough reputation to modify other’s rep points - you need at least 15.
[/quote]
I’m talking about being able to see the rep button, i know you need 15 rep to actually rep someone.[/quote]
yeah i think it is 25 posts to see it and 15 to actually use it. Also just noticed snake as your avatar there thug

Read full topic
item.source: I cannot see the rep ++ button somebody help?

item.title: I cannot see the rep ++ button somebody help?
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

Rep on MoparScape.org is not the same as rep on Moparisthebest.com. You have 10 rep on this site, which means that you won’t see the Rep++ button on this site.

Read full topic
